last_episode_to_air.name: Stark Raving Mad
last_episode_to_air.overview: Tim vows to stand his ground.  Jeff goes to bat for Joe, but one last stunning claim from a familiar face turns the story on its head yet again.

name: Tiger King
overview: A zoo owner spirals out of control amid a cast of eccentric characters in this true murder-for-hire story from the underworld of big cat breeding.

episodes.name: Not Your Average Joe
episodes.overview: Meet Joe Exotic, the gun-toting operator of an Oklahoma big cat park. Heâ€™s been accused of hiring someone to murder his chief rival, Carole Baskin.

episodes.name: Cult of Personality
episodes.overview: Subjected to long hours, little (or no) pay and the whims of eccentric bosses: are big cat park employees just cogs in a web of personality cults?

episodes.name: The Secret
episodes.overview: An incident in Carole's past casts her in a suspicious light, and while she maintains her innocence, Joe is all too happy to point the finger at her.

episodes.name: Playing with Fire
episodes.overview: Joe ramps up his efforts to become an internet and TV star, but a mysterious fire and lawsuit threaten his plans â€” until an angel investor appears.

episodes.name: Make America Exotic Again
episodes.overview: As Joe dives into politics, he deals with turmoil and tragedy in his personal life. Meanwhile, the dynamics at the park change with the new owners.

episodes.name: The Noble Thing to Do
episodes.overview: James Garretson makes a shocking claim about Joe, leading to FBI involvement. Desperation sets in for Joe, who thinks Jeff and James have set him up.

episodes.name: Dethroned
episodes.overview: Joe faces the music in the courtroom but insists the story is far from over. Jeffâ€™s business prospects crumble. Former G.W. Zoo workers try to move on.

episodes.name: The Tiger King and I
episodes.overview: In this aftershow, Joel McHale talks with Jeff, Saff, Erik and more to get their reactions to the series, their portrayals  and their new fame

episodes.name: Beg Your Pardon
episodes.overview: With Joe in prison, others from the series seek to capitalize on their fame.  Meanwhile, a team forms to press Donald Trump for a presidential pardon.

guest_stars.character: Self - Captive Animal Law Enforcement, PETA
guest_stars.name: Brittany Peet

episodes.name: The Carole Diaries
episodes.overview: Renewed interest in Don's disappearance leads authorities, journalists and his children to investigate how, when -- and even if -- he was killed.

episodes.name: Bounty Hunting
episodes.overview: Don's daughters escalate their efforts to learn more about their father's fate.  Carole's version of events faces further scrutiny.

episodes.name: The Lyin' King
episodes.overview: Jeff  goes on the defensive when acquaintances and former associates accuse him of misdeeds.  Meanwhile, Tim faces legal issues in Indiana.
